statements: UPDATE player_inventory SET total_items = 15, total_weight = 20.5 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_inventory SET player_name = 'John Doe', total_weight = 10.75 WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE player_inventory SET total_items = 10, total_weight = 25.75 WHERE player_id = 123
UPDATE player_inventory SET player_name = 'Alice', total_items = total_items + 5 WHERE player_id = 456
UPDATE items SET item_name='Sword of Power', item_description='A mighty sword forged by the gods' WHERE item_id=1;
UPDATE player_inventory SET equipped=TRUE, quantity=5 WHERE player_id=100 AND item_id=2;
UPDATE items SET item_name = 'Sword of the Ancients', item_rarity = 'legendary' WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE player_inventory SET equipped = TRUE, quantity = 10 WHERE player_id = 100 AND item_id = 3;
UPDATE player_inventory SET currency = 150 WHERE player_id = 100
UPDATE player_item_inventory SET quantity = 10 WHERE player_id = 200 AND item_id = 5
UPDATE player_inventory SET currency = currency + 100 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_item_inventory SET quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE player_id = 2 AND item_id = 5;
UPDATE player SET player_level = 10 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 5 WHERE player_id = 1 AND item_id = 3;
UPDATE player SET player_level = player_level + 1 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE item SET item_category = 'Weapon' WHERE item_id = 3;
UPDATE players SET player_level = 15 WHERE player_id = 101;
UPDATE items SET item_description = 'New description' WHERE item_id = 201;
UPDATE items SET item_name = 'Updated Item Name', item_type = 'New Type' WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE players SET player_name = 'Updated Player Name', player_level = player_level + 1, player_experience = player_experience * 1.5 WHERE player_id = 10;
